directions: Stir kale, apples, avocados, tomatoes, red onion, and cilantro together in a bowl.
Whisk olive oil, cider vinegar, garlic, oregano, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl until dressing is smooth and thickened. Pour dressing over kale mixture and toss to coat completely.
ingredients: 2 bunches fresh kale, cut into bite-size pieces
1 cup halved cherry tomatoes, or more to taste
3 tablespoons olive oil, or to taste
2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar, or to taste
1 pinch dried oregano, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Melissa's Kale Salad
